metadata.title: CVE-2015-8833 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the create_smp_dialog function ingtk-dialog.c in the Off-the-Record Messaging (OTR) pidgin-otr plugin before4.0.2 for Pidgin allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code viavectors related to the "Authenticate buddy" menu item.

criterions.comment: pidgin-otr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
